sentences.en: Aleko denied taking it and led Dimitri into his backyard.
sentences.cn: 阿列科不承认,并把迪米特里领进院子.

sentences.en: Backyard barbecue grills could be proscribed.
sentences.cn: 里弄烤肉店会被勒令停业的.

sentences.en: Come on, I'll give you the grand tour of the backyard.
sentences.cn: 跟我来, 我带你去后院来一次盛大的旅游.

sentences.en: Economics will not stop Europe's politicians complaining when jobs are lost in their own backyard.
sentences.cn: 当本国人口在失业时，经济情况是无法让欧洲的政治家停止抱怨的。

sentences.en: Farmers usually keep chickens in their backyard.
sentences.cn: 农民们通常在自己的后院养鸡.

sentences.en: He had an assemblage of old junk cars filling the backyard.
sentences.cn: 他的后院里堆满了废旧汽车。

sentences.en: He stacked the firewood in the backyard.
I parked the car in the backyard.
I saw a hare in my backyard this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨我看见后院有一只野兔.

sentences.en: Our house is on an acre of land which gives us a nice big backyard for our garden.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子坐落在一英亩的土地上,因而后院地方很大,可供我们辟为花园.

sentences.en: The boys buried the dead bird in the backyard.
sentences.cn: 孩子们把死鸟埋在后院.

sentences.en: The children were playing about in the backyard.
The defence party divided his backyard from that of his sister's.
sentences.cn: 一堵共用的墙把他跟他妹妹的后院隔开了.

sentences.en: The moon lay on the glazed snow of the backyard.
sentences.cn: 月亮照在后院闪闪发光的雪山上.

sentences.en: The old man grew vegetables in his backyard.
sentences.cn: 老人在屋后院子里种了蔬菜。

sentences.en: The rabbits in our backyard were a magnet that attracted all the children in the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 我家后院的兔子像磁铁一样吸引着邻居所有的孩子.

trans.tran_en: a small area behind a house, covered with a hard surface
